threat: An attacker on an authenticated client could use this issue to possibly execute arbitrary code.

An attacker on an authenticated client could use this issue to possibly perform unauthorized actions.
An attacker could use this issue to possibly downgrade connections to SSLv2.
An attacker on an authenticated client could use this issue to possibly cause a denial of service, or execute arbitrary.
